titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the need to pass legislation to increase penalties on perpetrators of hate crimes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Introduced. Calls for passage of legislation that sets penalties for acts of violence against persons because of their actual or perceived race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, or disability. Condemns the culture of hate and the hate groups that foster such acts.
